Teams seasons rosters

Source: R/teams_rosters_history.R
teams_rosters.Rd

Gets NBA teams rosters for specified seasons

teams_rosters(seasons = 1990:2018, nest_data = F, return_message = T)

Arguments

seasons

vector of seasons
nest_data

if TRUE returns nested data frame
return_message

if TRUE returns a message

Value

a tibble

See also

Other rosters: seasons_rosters(), team_season_roster()

Examples

teams_rosters(seasons = 2010:2018, nest_data = F, return_message = T)
